column4: hi, i just did this :: http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/upgrading :: on my box, and rebooted. it now boots to grub, passes that and gives a fast flickering "_" then after a bit, it goes to a _ jusit flicking on and off slowly
it may be your kernel - if you can get to the grub selection menu, you may want to try an older kernel
sites can block known tor exitpoints
